page.title: 13EDUCATION IN MIDDLETON
page.content: In Middleton there are 3 Nursery schools, 18 Primary Schools (including 5 C of E & 4 RC), 3 Junior High Schools (11-14), 2 Senior High Schools (14-18+) & 2 R.C Secondary Schools. In Primary Schools basic skills in English and Maths are taught in an informal setting with time given to thematic work. At 11+ children transfer to Junior High Schools, where subjects include Arts, Humanities, Languages, Science, Craft, Design and Technology. At 14+ they go to Senior High Schools which have courses leading to C.S.E. & G.C.E. "O" & "A" Level examinations. At present reorganisation of education in the area is being discussed. Extra help is given to children with special needs. Pastoral care involves teachers backed up by Psychologists, Welfare Officers and Health Visitors.
